name.en: Topic Research in Analytic Chemistry Ⅱ

content.en: Each advisor instructs students doing topical research according to their thesis content.
content.ch: 本課程將應用python、Excel等程式語言製圖，須指導教授簽署專題研究同意書，研究內容、時間及地點請與指導教授洽談。

method.ch: 實習/實驗 個別指導
